title: Square Enix's Plans for PS5, Xbox Series X - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.26.20
description:
Tim and Greg talk about Square Enix's plan to stay away from next-gen exclusives for a while, a bunch of new games, and more.

Time Stamps -
00:01:45 - Housekeeping
Zelda In Review comes out on the 3rd anniversary of Breath of the Wild...March 3rd, that’s NEXT TUESDAY, as a YouTube Premiere at 2pm PT on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
James Davis, Frankfurter, Drew Gardiner, Katie Gallacher, David Meintel, Shiraz Razak, Dominic Shorter, Mohammed Mohammed, Patrick Higgins, Ginny Berndt, The Nano Biologist, Travis  Guy-kow-ski, Joseph Soler
The Roper Report   -
00:04:18 - Square Enix won’t make PS5 or Xbox Series X Exclusives for a bit, Samuel Tolbert @ Windows Central
00:06:45 - Today Square Enix confirmed that all of their games currently in development (including FFVII Remake and The Avengers) will be available on "next-gen consoles". What got my attention was the use of plurals: "consoles". Does this mean that the PS5 will have a Smart Delivery system like what the Series X will have? - Best Friends Q: KBABZ
00:16:15 - Hey, New Games From Devs you Like!
00:23:55 - Even more Horizon on PC Evidence, Fraser Brown @ PC Gamer
00:25:00 - If Sony is moving it's first party games to PC as a new initiative for next gen wouldn't it make more sense to save something like this for when you drop all the PS5 details? - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:31:40 - Facebook buys Sanzaru, Reb @ GIB
00:34:25 - Konami Code Creator Has Died, Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:35:55 - Modder Gives Cuphead a Celeste-like Assist Mode, DualShockers
00:39:35 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:47:56 - With Resident Evil 3 feeling more action based than RE2; do you feel like this could possibly be laying the groundwork for a much desired Resident Evil 4 Remake? - Alex Duez
00:53:59 - “What other famous cheats do you remember growing up with video games?” 
 - Shawn G.
00:56:26 - Squad Up: Taylar Allan (PS4) - Purger4382
00:57:52 - You‘re Wrong
01:24:17 - Post Show 
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Whitta
